related_post.text: > parse the json@deezy Ok but using this as external module without initializing it I have to parse this each time. Or is there a way to achive persistence?I mean ideally this should be used like this:``` externalPackage.Lookup("foo") ```Without any prior initialization I would have to unmarshal this json each time
